author: suicida95
content: kiln explorer is down for 2 days now, anyone knows one that is working?

author: cheerful_piglet_95568
content: Hi team, now that the merge has occured, can we remove the terminal total difficult setting ?

author: ralexstokes
content: we have only merged ropsten, and still have two more testnets to go before mainnet

author: cheerful_piglet_95568
content: for ropsten since the merge has happened , can we disable this  setting?

author: ralexstokes
content: you mean as a local CLI flag? perhaps but i would check w/ the client devs of the client(s) you are running

author: m.kalinin
content: You should wait for releases to be out with the actual TTD included in binary distribution, then upgrade your nodes and then it should be completely safe to remove the flag. Running an already synced node (synced beyond the Merge transition) should be fine but might be buggy in some edge cases
